options.description: Time in milliseconds of the delay of left signal into right and vice versa. Default is 20 milliseconds.
options.name: delay

options.description: Amount of gain in delayed signal into right and vice versa. Gives a delay effect of left signal in right output and vice versa which gives widening effect. Default is 0.3.
options.name: feedback

options.description: Cross feed of left into right with inverted phase. This helps in suppressing the mono. If the value is 1 it will cancel all the signal common to both channels. Default is 0.3.
options.name: crossfeed

options.description: Set level of input signal of original channel. Default is 0.8.
options.name: drymix
